title: App_ihug
author: App_ihug
content: I am user  Ihugbogo My account was reported for plagiarism here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1926895.msg61095170#msg61095170 By CantsayMy responds to the user who asked a question was not to harm the forum, but just a solid explanation with the help of the research and answer from google, which i copied and failed to add reference link, and the respond my opinion was also added. Quote from: Ivartheragnarson on October 04, 2022, 08:00:34 AMI have participated for 2, 3 airdrops and i have won some decentralized , web3 domains. what are the potentialÂ  of them and what are the benefits of holding them. explain me simply if you could plz. Thank youI will understand if my account is Temp restricted, for i have failed one of the community rules and regulation.Pls Mod. if the above listed reason by Cantsay is just my crime i will appeal for my account to be unban, for i have lots to learn in the forum and i believe i also have lots to contribute. Thanks.  Ihugbogo

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: What a ridiculous excuse. So you were able to copy and paste someone else's text, but you couldn't copy and paste the link. Nevertheless, look how many links you have inserted in your appeal topic. So you know how to insert links. You didn't just copy and paste someone else's text, you also added your own text, thereby appropriating someone else's text.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: App_ihug on October 12, 2022, 12:41:41 PMi believe i also have lots to contribute.Less than 8 minutes later: ban evasion.

comments.author: App_ihug
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on October 12, 2022, 12:57:51 PMWhat a ridiculous excuse. So you were able to copy and paste someone else's text, but you couldn't copy and paste the link. Nevertheless, look how many links you have inserted in your appeal topic. So you know how to insert links. You didn't just copy and paste someone else's text, you also added your own text, thereby appropriating someone else's text.Yes that's my mistake for not adding link to the source of my information. Quote from: LoyceV on October 12, 2022, 12:59:17 PMQuote from: App_ihug on October 12, 2022, 12:41:41 PMi believe i also have lots to contribute.Less than 8 minutes later: ban evasion. Could possibly delete the reply on the other thread, for i have seen Rossy suggestion to stick my created thread for the appeal

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: You know, Xal0lex isn't wrong. You know how to create hyperlinks as seen in the OP and some of your other posts. There is also a post where you quote a saying from your country and you use quotation marks. Quote from: Ihugbogo on October 07, 2022, 11:35:38 PMMy people always says "Nah who get food to chop they save"... All that shows that you know about these things. If the copy-pasted parts were in quote tags, italicized, or in quotation marks, like in the example above, people could say you made some effort to make it easier to distinguish your words from the parts that were taken from somewhere else. This could be a case of someone forgetting to put the source link or someone intentionally leaving it out for whatever reason. You will have to convince the admins that it's the latter.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: App_ihug on October 12, 2022, 01:26:28 PMQuote from: LoyceV on October 12, 2022, 12:59:17 PMQuote from: App_ihug on October 12, 2022, 12:41:41 PMi believe i also have lots to contribute.Less than 8 minutes later: ban evasion. Could possibly delete the reply on the other thread, for i have seen Rossy suggestion to stick my created thread for the appeal You can delete it by yourself. Go to the post and hit the delete button, It will be at the top right corner of your post on the other thread.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: App_ihug on October 12, 2022, 12:41:41 PMMy responds to the user who asked a question was not to harm the forum, but just a solid explanation with the help of the research and answer from google, which i copied and failed to add reference link, and the respond my opinion was also added.  You should always copy the source link first so as not to make any mistake that will cost you your account, before you start to copy any other thing you wish to copyI replied to a post today concerning Plagarism ðŸ‘‡Quote from: Cantsay on October 12, 2022, 06:02:40 AM[...] "if you come across any discussion in the forum and you don't know anything concerning what's been discussed instead of looking for an article to copy from why not just read everything that's been discussed so that when next you come across similar topic you'll have an idea of what to reply."Some users behave as if they're gonna get punished if they don't reply to a post.

Are you also evading a ban, it turns out?Quote from: Ihugbogo on March 31, 2022, 02:35:53 PMNew proof of Authentication for suspended accountProfile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3447372Username: IhugbogoCampaign: Twitter, Facebook, Telegram, MediumKucoin trx wallet: TNAGpJi5xA2DRz6Drt34LD725XN3yvEUAcOld proof of Authentication: To the old accountðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5382751.msg59101297#msg59101297Image to lock account proof: https://imgur.com/a/A9XJCqQ Is this your account too?viskryptoQuote from: Ihugbogo on March 24, 2022, 04:53:27 PMCampaign: Discord:Profile Link: viskrypto#1806

comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on October 12, 2022, 02:32:50 PMIs this your account too?maybe Ever-young is also his other account.https://ninjastic.space/post/60836474Quote from: Ihugbogo on September 03, 2022, 11:17:47 PMCampaign Type: TwitterProfile Link: https://mobile.twitter.com/Ihugbogo1https://ninjastic.space/post/60879258the two accounts also appear to be connected in blockchain transactions.https://bscscan.com/address/0x2903294c29fbdb06e88ba18496e901fa46082190#tokentxnsQuote0x60B641b9574e0e590b4bEA33D34B08Fb00f4585b :Â  Ihugbogo0xD6671C5a5D5b836D48D4015FAdE47c1B2B159a0d : Ever-youngmaybe Ever-young's account also has the same experience of copying people's work as Ihugbogo's account

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on October 12, 2022, 02:32:50 PMIs this your account too?viskryptoQuote from: Ihugbogo on March 24, 2022, 04:53:27 PMCampaign: Discord:Profile Link: viskrypto#1806Quote from: Pandu Geddon on October 12, 2022, 05:30:52 PMQuote0x60B641b9574e0e590b4bEA33D34B08Fb00f4585b :Â  Ihugbogo0xD6671C5a5D5b836D48D4015FAdE47c1B2B159a0d : Ever-youngmaybe Ever-young's account also has the same experience of copying people's work as Ihugbogo's accountÂ  God save the forum :-)These days it became common. Someone finds an alt and following the alt others brings more alts. If it continues and all these accounts are indeed alts then I am wondering how many unique users actually forum has?The forum needs KYC sooner LOLI'll need a special treatment though :-P

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 13, 2022, 02:16:46 PMThese days it became common. Someone finds an alt and following the alt others brings more alts. If it continues and all these accounts are indeed alts then I am wondering how many unique users actually forum has?The forum needs KYC sooner LOLI'll need a special treatment though :-PWould you like to make a roll call? Â People are greedy. Alternative accounts are not created out of love for the forum and not to increase knowledge commensurate with the number of accounts. KYC won't change anything. As for the OP, he's probably already created a bunch of new accounts for himself. Pandu Geddon, I have also seen general transactions, but it looks like people are dumping tokens into one basket.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on October 14, 2022, 05:35:11 AMWould you like to make a roll call? Â A neigh, neigh, neigh LOLI gave up volunteering for the forum unfortunately. Dropped out myself from many things already.QuotePeople are greedy. Alternative accounts are not created out of love for the forum and not to increase knowledge commensurate with the number of accounts. KYC won't change anything. I don't think any of us are against having alternative accounts as long as the intention is not bad for the person. KYC was the joke anyway.
